<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

---

By combining a [lesser alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), a [ lesser thunderstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79), and other catalysts with a pressure sensitive trigger, you create a snare that creates a fiery and thunderous explosion when triggered. The target and all creatures in adjacent squares take 2d6 fire damage and 2d6 sonic damage with a basic DC 19 Reflex save. On a failure, they are deafened for 1d4 rounds and take 1d4 persistent fire damage.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a [lesser alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) and a [ lesser thunderstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79).
